properties.name: Alaska, US
properties.description: Posted by HilAlaska, USOn my way back from Japan my family and I traveled around Alaska for a few weeks. Incredible scenery!

properties.name: Auckland, NZ
properties.description: Posted by HilAuckland, New ZealandTraveled all around New Zealand for a month of driving. We drove around the entire South Island and most of the North Island, starting in Auckland.

properties.name: Beijing, China
properties.description: Posted by HilBeijing, ChinaTraveled here while living in Hiroshima, Japan.

properties.name: Boston, Mass, US
properties.description: Posted by HilBoston, Mass, USFor an American History credit I traveled here. It is one of my all time favorite places to visit. I would love to live here!

properties.name: Cairnes, Australia
properties.description: Posted by HilCairnes, AustraliaTraveled here to snorkel the Great Barrier Reef.

properties.name: Chiang Mai, Thailand
properties.description: Posted by HilChiang Mai, ThailandThis was a sudden trip to Thailand while living in Japan. A great place to see!

properties.name: Columbus, Ohio
properties.description: Posted by Hil This was a spot during our "vacation without destination" that we took. We started from home, and just followed the roads that looked good to us. We spent the entire week in Ohio, only spending one night on the border of Kentucky.

properties.name: Dublin, Ireland
properties.description: Posted by HilThis is one of the many places on the top of my traveling list :) My family, partly, on my mother\'s side is irish so getting to Ireland is top priority! It\'s supposed to be the most amazing place. The people friendly, the landscape incredible to see, and so much to do there you would need over two weeks just for Ireland and no other place in the UK or Europe for that matter! Can\'t wait to actually have been there!

properties.name: Hawaii, US
properties.description: Posted by HilHawaii, USI met my family here about nine months after moving to Japan. We traveled Maui, the Big Island (Hawaii) and Oahu.

properties.name: Hiroshima, Japan
properties.description: Posted by HilHiroshima, JapanLived here for two and a half years.

properties.name: Hiroshima, Japan
properties.description: Posted by HilI lived here for 2 and 1/2 years. A second home.

properties.name: Home Base
properties.description: Posted by HilHome Base. Where I start most of my travels and is home for now.

properties.name: Hungary
properties.description: Posted by HilCan\'t wait to visit Hungary. It\'s supposed to be one of the greatest places in the world. Hope to get there soon!! Look up pictures of Hungary and the Danube, it\'s incredible.

properties.name: Mackanac, Michigan, US
properties.description: Posted by HilMackanac, Michigan, USThis is a really interesting place. The no cars rule makes it really fun to visit!

properties.name: New Smyrna, Fl, US
properties.description: Posted by HilNew Smyrna, Fl, USI visited my grandparents here a few times. The shark capitol of, at least, the US!

properties.name: Okinawa, Japan
properties.description: Posted by HilOkinawa, JapanMy first trip from Japan. It was a great place to see. Right off the beach you could see colorful fishes and corals. It was really neat!

properties.name: Saijo
properties.description: Posted by HilSaijo, JapanThis is where my friends, the Takabe\'s. live. It;s also where the Sake Festival is, held every year and spread out through the city. It\'s really cool!

properties.name: Scotland
properties.description: Posted by Hil ScotlandMy family history can be traced back to Scotland, our family name apparently originating or something there. Hopefully, my family and I will take a trip there this fall! Should be great!

properties.name: Seattle, WA
properties.description: Posted by HilSeattle, WASeattle is a really cool place. The university there has a beautiful campus and the city is so interesting.

properties.name: Seoul, South Korea
properties.description: Posted by HilSeoul, South KoreaThis was the first stop in a China and Korea trip when I was living in Japan (most of our traveling was from Japan).

properties.name: Texas, US
properties.description: Posted by HilTexas, USMy geography project was to plan and navigate our way to Texas. Austin and San Antonio are my favorite.

properties.name: Tokyo, Japan
properties.description: Posted by HilTokyo, JapanI visited here right before moving back to the US. Had to see the capitol!

properties.name: UP, MI, US
properties.description: Posted by HilUP, MI, USThis was one Summer trip in July. Great for hiking.

properties.name: Ypsi, Mi, USA
properties.description: Posted by HilHome base for now.

properties.name: Ypsilanti, Mi, USA
properties.description: Posted by HilYpsilanti, Mi, USAHome base for now!
